Sneha ( that’s me), with over a decade of experience in supply chain management and lean manufacturing within the construction industry, has lived the pain of using ERPs in this industry.
one_liner: AI powered ERP for Construction

name: Midship
long_description: Midship is the fastest way to perform substantive tests during a financial audit. We accelerate procedures by automating repetitive document based tasks, with agents built just for audit.
one_liner: AI for Financial Audit Procedures

name: PathPilot
long_description: Fintechs, banks, and other institutions managing financial services face constant pressure to reduce costs, enhance customer experience, and ensure regulatory compliance. PathPilot provides the speed of pre-built AI agents combined with the flexibility of full customization. This enables internal teams to remain in full control—designing, deploying, and governing AI solutions independently, without reliance on external vendors.
one_liner: AI platform helping fintech/bank teams scale efficiently

name: Riveter AI
long_description:
Riveter is bringing the power of Perplexity to the scale of the spreadsheet. Their AI agents, custom scrapers, and integrations pack the power of browser use and automation for search, at a cost that allows for scale. 

Most teams still spend hours (or hire UpWorkers/contractors) to manually copy product specs, check competitor pricing, pull custom KYB/KYC data to assess customer risk, or scrape filings. 

Perplexity and ChatGPT are great for single questions, but they can’t handle large amounts of data at once. And they’re working with a single agent and context window instead of one in every cell.

And Riveter’s web browsing can go further—even reading PDFs and images that may contain answers. 

With Riveter, anyone can automate complex, auditable web research… without coding. 

Our founding team brings deep product and engineering expertise from to YC-backed companies Gusto, Retool, and Middesk.
one_liner: Thousands of AI search agents running in parallel

name: Galini
long_description:
Galini guardrails-as-a-service filter harmful inputs and outputs based on company policies and industry regulations. We make it easy for enterprises to create, test, deploy and refine guardrails.
With Galini, product and engineering leaders enjoy peace of mind knowing their AI apps are compliant at run-time, and save $1-10M in costs from avoiding in-house build
one_liner: Compliance guardrails-as-a-service for AI applications

name: Symphony
long_description: Symphony helps enterprises train their customer-facing employees using interactive AI voice simulations of real-world scenarios. Users can create an infinite number of simulations that allow their teams to practice the job - avoiding costly mistakes with real customers. For example, we’re live with 2 of the top 3 auto insurers in NA, helping train 1000s of newly hired claims adjusters.
one_liner: Voice AI sims for next-gen employee training

name: Upshift
long_description:
Upshift is an asynchronous coding agent workspace to help your software development lifecycle.

Access Claude Code and other agents in a shared team environment, so you can explore them easily, share prompt techniques, and unlock the value of asynchronous AI in your organization.

You can use Upshift today to automate dependency bumps, tidy up sprawling debt code, and handle routine pull requests.
one_liner: Cloud workspace for coding agents

name: Summed AI
long_description: Summed AI is an AI assistant that digs up accurate Medicare policy details for you 90% faster, so you can enroll your clients quicker with fewer compliance dings.
one_liner: The AI Copilot for Insurance Agents

name: Revyl
long_description: Revyl is a proactive observability platform that automatically catches and triages bugs before they reach production.
one_liner: Proactive observability

name: Vespper
long_description:
Vespper is an AI copilot for regulatory professionals in life science.
We help save time and effort from workflows such as:
manual document processing, time-consuming database searches and regulatory monitoring.
one_liner: AI copilot for regulatory professionals

name: CTGT
long_description: CTGT is building the next evolution of AI, towards intelligence that is foundationally designed to be efficient and trustworthy. Our enterprise-grade platform prevents AI hallucinations and errors in real-time while maximizing ROI. Based on seminal research that opens the "black box" of AI, we enable Fortune 500 companies to deploy AI with confidence through automated risk prevention, comprehensive audit trails, and institutional-grade security controls. With AI adoption surging to 72%, we help organizations avoid costly mistakes and reputation damage while achieving 99.99% reliability and 10x faster deployment times. Trusted by industry leaders and backed by prominent investors, CTGT transforms AI from a liability into a competitive advantage.
one_liner: Entirely New AI Stack: Efficient and Safe Alternative to LLM Ecosystem

name: Luthor
long_description:
We’re building the first AI-Native Compliance Firm for RIAs, wealth advisors, and fintechs.

We're doing this by blending AI workflows with veteran ex-regulators so we can keep firms SEC/FINRA-ready in minutes, not days.
one_liner: AI-Native Compliance Firm

name: Lingo.dev
long_description: Lingo.dev helps dev teams use LLMs for app localization and content translation. Lingo.dev Compiler helps React developers localize apps without rewriting the existing code. Lingo.dev CLI helps web and mobile teams use AI for producing perfect translations for their user interfaces and docs. Lingo.dev SDK helps use LLMs for real-time translations.
one_liner: Open-source, AI-powered i18n toolkit for instant localization.

name: Platus
long_description: Platus delivers fast, reliable legal infrastructure with a no-code platform and API, designed to support SMBs with instant access to notarization, legal drafting, e-signing, and workflow automations. Our solution removes the high costs and slow processing of traditional legal services, by empowering businesses to seamlessly manage compliance and legal tasks.
one_liner: Instant Legal Infrastructure - Draft, Sign, Notarize & Process

name: Tiny
long_description: At Tiny, we’re building a new kind of ERP system for factories where AI agents automate repetitive workflows. Made for the four million factories still primarily relying on Excel. LLMs now unlock their troves of siloed unstructured data. We see a massive opportunity to build a compound startup and, beyond that, tap into network effects to unlock just-in-time manufacturing across entire supply chains.
one_liner: A new kind of ERP system for factories

name: AutoComputer
long_description: AutoComputer is a desktop robotic process automation system.  Given just a text prompt, our AI automates tedious tasks such as financial data entry by performing all the clicks and keystrokes for you.
one_liner: Desktop RPA with AI computer use

name: Dexter
long_description: Dexter builds AI agents for mechanical contractors, like HVAC and plumbing businesses. Our agents capture field updates by conversation, digitize paperwork, and automate reporting, giving back-office teams real-time visibility into the field.
one_liner: AI agents for mechanical contractors

name: Autumn
long_description:
Autumn is open-source infrastructure over Stripe that allows AI startups to build their pricing plans quickly, and flexibly. We act as your app's DB and manage who's paying for what, track usage and manage customer feature access.

YC companies use us because we make it easy to handle common pricing models like usage-based, credits, subscriptions, rollovers and more in 3 functions and no webhooks. 

As you scale, you get reliable billing, that you can change however you want without wrangling code (we handle versioning, migrations etc), and manage custom pricing too. Everything you could down the line (credits, multiple subscription groups, rollovers, referral program, usage analytics, centralized team billing etc), you can drop in at any point.
one_liner: Stripe for AI startups

name: Gecko Security
long_description: We built Gecko for teams that want to build secure code quickly without wasting time on security tools that don’t deliver results, or relying on one-time human pentests that quickly become outdated. Gecko uses AI to understand how your application should work, simulates relevant attacks to find critical vulnerabilities, and then verifies these vulnerabilities by exploiting them. It also helps you understand the risk of these vulnerabilities and applies a working fix to keep your code secure.
one_liner: The AI Security Engineer to Find and Fix Vulnerabilities

name: Chorrie
long_description: Chorrie provides healthcare RCM automation using AI browser agents to handle the busywork of heavily-manual processes like medical coding, billing, insurance followup, and more.  Using the latest models and custom automation tools tailored specifically for the provider's needs, Chorrie brings scalable automation to healthcare practices so they can focus on what matters.
one_liner: Intelligent automation for healthcare

name: ArchiLabs
long_description:
ArchiLabs is building an AI co-pilot for architecture. Instead of spending hours on tedious tasks, architects can 10x their design speed with simple AI prompts.

Brian and William met at Carnegie Mellon as engineers and separately had their own frustrating new construction experiences. Brian ran a tech-enabled homebuilding factory and found the design iteration process to be a massive bottleneck, while William built ground up homes in Texas and had a similar frustration. However, at the time, there wasn't an easy solution to the many pain points in the design process.

As AI reasoning models improve, Brian and William realized that there was a massive opportunity to fix the long-tail of frustrations and build a new construction design experience by fine tuning existing models, becoming bigger than Autodesk, the $60B company in the space.
one_liner: AI Copilot for Architects

name: Edgedive
long_description:
Listening to your customers is really hard at scale. Edgedive makes it easy.

We collect, tag, and synthesize all incoming feedback from every channel and link it to your CRM so you Product, Eng, and CX teams can focus on building what their customers want.

🔎 Answer any question about anything your customers are saying

🎫 Automatically tag support tickets & quantify revenue impact

🗣️ Schedule custom, automatic voice of customer reports

💸 Identify gaps leading to churn or closed-lost deals

🧪 Get  a shortlist good beta testers for any feature

🤩 Monitor customer reactions to launches, live

…all in seconds, not days (or weeks).
one_liner: Understand what your customers are actually saying
subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate

name: SRE.ai
long_description: Reliability on autopilot. Free you team to build what's next.
one_liner: AI DevOps Agents

name: Relvy AI
long_description: Relvy provides AI-powered debugging notebooks that help software engineers investigate and resolve incidents faster. It finds the root cause in over 70% of alerts automatically, and when it doesn’t, engineers can easily guide or correct the investigation—saving valuable time across the team.
one_liner: AI powered debugging notebooks for incident response

name: Quantstruct
long_description:
Quantstruct automatically creates and improves product documentation, implementation guides, and changelogs for API & SDK products, web-based enterprise software, and internal applications.

Quantstruct identifies gaps in your knowledge base based on each product release or unfulfilled customer query. It uses multiple AI agents to search existing knowledge sources, test existing docs for validity and style guidelines, and clicks, scrolls, and uses enterprise software through a web browser to generate docs with embedded screenshots and video recordings. Quanstruct is available as a cloud service to start, targeting technical writers, content writing, professional services, and product teams.

Traditional generative AI tools risk hallucinating critical API & SDK fields, even with RAG based approaches. Purely agent-based approaches risk providing unpredictable output that can diverge from desired documentation processes. Finally, no company’s review and publishing workflow is the same. Quantstruct is the easiest way to onboard and customize AI agents to continuously improve your documentation based on your customer needs and product evolution. https://quantstruct.com
one_liner: AI documentation engineer – test & autoimprove stale product docs

name: Trace
long_description:
We started Trace because we believe AI should wow customers, not frustrate them. As a result, we prioritize reliability and seamless customer interactions. 

Trace AI agents resolve calls end-to-end, securely integrating with bank systems and external APIs. So far, our agents handle quoting, application, and transaction tracking calls for our partners — but we’re still searching for new exciting use cases.

Question to all fintechs/banks: Which customer requests keep coming back to you? We’d love to learn how you handle them now and if they are ripe for automation.
one_liner: Voice AI Customer Support for Financial Services

name: Vetnio
long_description: Veterinarians spend 40% of their time on admin work, >20% on note taking alone. We're here to change that so they can focus on what really matters - providing the best care possible for animals.
one_liner: AI Copilot that automates admin work for veterinary professionals

name: Leaping AI
long_description:
Leaping AI is the only platform for self-improving voice AI agents.

We automated contact centers employing >100 human agents and now handle their incoming customer support and sales calls, end-to-end. All while maintaining 90% customer satisfaction score.

For another company, our voice AI agents were able to convert 30% of contacted leads within a week of the outbound campaign. A similar campaign with humans previously took that same company 5 weeks.
one_liner: The only self-improving voice AI

name: NextByte
long_description:
NextByte’s AI recruiter helps you identify top candidates faster, so your team can focus on what matters – building your product and hiring the best talent. Our platform understands the requirements for each role and tailors voice-driven technical and non-technical evaluations to surface candidates who are ready for your next onsite interview. 

NextByte can screen hundreds of candidates simultaneously and provides rubric-based, detailed evaluations in minutes. Our analytics dashboards provide a clear view of technical ability, problem-solving skills, and communication under pressure across your candidate pool, so you can confidently move the right candidates forward. With NextByte, hiring teams save time, reduce bias, and make faster, data-driven hiring decisions without sacrificing quality.
one_liner: AI recruiter tuned to identify the best vibe coders

name: Admyral
long_description: Admyral is the first AI-native Commercial Real Estate Brokerage. Real estate brokers use our first product, deep research agents, to discover hard-to-find contact details of property owners.
one_liner: AI-Native Commercial Real Estate Brokerage

name: Dartboard Energy
long_description: Dartboard is an AI Analyst for Electricity Markets, starting with the owners of grid-scale battery projects.
one_liner: AI Analyst for Electricity Markets

name: Promptless
long_description:
Docs are integral to a great customer experience, but managing them is a challenging, multi-team effort. The most successful companies recognize that fantastic docs drive adoption and bad ones cause customers to churn. Promptless is used by fast-growing startups and Fortune 500 enterprises alike to automatically update docs based on feature releases, support tickets, internal Slack conversations, and more.

Promptless is designed to be flexible—it can integrate with any docs platform, be triggered automatically from many workflows, and can pull in context from any internal knowledge source.

With Promptless, documentation becomes a strategic advantage for growth, not a bottleneck or a liability.
one_liner: An AI teammate that automatically updates your customer-facing docs

name: Rocketable
long_description:
Rocketable is building a large portfolio of wildly profitable software businesses by acquiring existing products and replacing human teams with AI agents.

Today’s foundation models already possess enough intelligence to automate most of the tasks required to run a profitable software business. In the functions where agents aren’t yet intelligent enough to replace humans, they will be soon.

When every human function required to operate a software product has an AI agent equivalent, the next step will be within reach: operating an entire company with a team of AI agents instead of humans.

But superintelligent agents within each function won’t be enough. To operate a software company with 0 human employees, the agents will need to be directed towards common goals, integrated to collaborate across functions, tuned with feedback loops connected to product metrics, and trained to make resource allocation decisions.

We are creating the tools needed to replace the entire org chart of a software company with a team of AI agents. We are developing these tools by owning the products that we automate, because we know from 10+ years of experience building automated systems with AI/ML that integration is the key to unlocking superhuman performance.
one_liner: The AI Maximalist Software Holding Company

name: Vora AI
long_description: Vora gives every hiring manager an AI recruiter. Our AI agent, Rachel, automates talent sourcing by handling everything from identifying top talent, to writing personalized outreach to scheduling interviews directly on the hiring manager's calendar. This allows teams to focus on what matters most - talking to and closing the best candidates.
one_liner: AI recruiter for hiring managers

name: Tejas AI
long_description: Tejas AI eliminates uncertainty, allowing decision-makers to develop and evaluate credit rules more quickly and effectively.
one_liner: Risk Decisioning Platform for Banks

name: Weave
long_description:
Weave uses AI to measure engineering.

We scan every PR and understand how much work people are doing and how good it is.
one_liner: AI to measure engineering work

name: Oki
long_description:
Oki AI tells you everything you need to know to run your company.

By reading your team’s code, tickets, messages, and more, Oki delivers personalized - and interactive - updates daily to you and other leaders.
one_liner: Personalized Updates on Company Progress

name: Operand
long_description:
Operand is building an AI to replace traditional consulting. We help businesses make better decisions by deeply analyzing their data across all sources—something consultants can’t do at scale.

We’re starting in e-commerce and retail, where the businesses’ high data density and real-time feedback loops allow us to show impact fast. Our first capability is pricing and discount strategy. Operand considers everything—competitor pricing, ad strategy, inventory, and more—to ensure businesses maximize profit.

And unlike other AI solutions, every Operand result is verified by human experts, including ex-MBB consultants, so you get actual impact, not just AI hype.

We’re already generating 6-figure P&L improvements for early customers.
one_liner: AI to Replace Management Consulting

name: HealthKey
long_description:
HealthKey helps doctors offices generate more revenue by identifying patients who are eligible for clinical trials, and matches at-risk patients with cutting-edge treatments. Big Pharma pays a lot of money to clinics for each patient they enroll, but finding patients who qualify is an entirely manual process today. We use AI to prescreen doctors’ existing patients against Clinical Trials’ eligibility criteria, making enrollment fast and easy.

Meet with Josh (CEO) 👉 https://cal.com/healthkey/15-min-meeting
one_liner: AI-powered Patient Identification for Clinical Trials

name: Olive
long_description: Olive connects to your database & third party services to help you build admin dashboards and support tools in minutes.
one_liner: Build internal tools for your data with natural language.

name: Gale
long_description: Gale makes getting a visa suck less. We’re disrupting the $10B immigration services market, starting with US business visas and green cards. We've simplified the visa application process to a web form, streamlined compliance, and can integrate with HR systems - saving teams time, money and headaches. By using AI and automation we enable the independent attorneys we coordinate with to maintain quality whilst being more efficient.
one_liner: AI Powered Immigration Platform

name: Asteroid
long_description: Asteroid builds and hosts browser AI agents for complex tasks. With built-in guardrails, evaluations and human oversight, we ensure enterprise-grade reliability across millions of operations in regulated industries.
one_liner: Browser agents for regulated industries

name: Cenote
long_description:
Cenote uses AI to automate the back office for medical practices — eliminating the bottlenecks that often delay patient care and clinic revenue.

Typically, practices hire teams to manually extract patient info from hundreds to thousands of faxes a week. This slow process risks losing patients to faster competitors. Cenote’s software streamlines this workflow. 

There are 330,000 medical practices in the U.S Capturing $50,000 per practice presents a $16.5 Billion opportunity.

The team behind Cenote—Kofi, Ajani, and Kristy—met in San Francisco and bring deep expertise in building scalable solutions for highly-regulated industries such as climate and gov tech.
one_liner: Automate back office tasks for medical clinics

name: Lopus AI
long_description:
Enterprise deals stall and die because scattered emails, siloed call transcripts, and hidden blockers force reps into constant firefights. Your deal teams burn hours reconstructing context instead of proactively closing revenue—costing you millions.

We've built Lopus AI, an AI-powered Deal Intelligence platform that automatically surfaces hidden deal blockers, unifies every stakeholder interaction into actionable insights, and turns your team's best wins into repeatable playbooks.

Engineered by Lopus AI, the GTM weapons lab.
one_liner: AI-Native Enterprise Deal Execution Platform

name: G LNK
long_description: G LNK is an AI-powered platform simplifying how healthcare companies connect with the relevant medical professionals. Our proprietary matching and ranking models instantly identify the most qualified experts, accelerating drug development and commercialization. Designed with compliance at its core, G LNK ensures every connection meets strict regulatory and ethical standards—empowering companies to innovate faster with confidence.
one_liner: Simplifying Collaboration for Healthcare Organizations & Professionals

name: Trata
long_description: Trata is an AI-powered research desk for hedge funds. We use agents to interview hedge fund analysts, write investment research, and distribute this through a subscription.
one_liner: AI-powered research desk for hedge funds

name: Bystreet
long_description: Bystreet is where deals are found.
one_liner: Automate deal origination with AI agents.

name: Riviera
long_description:
Riviera builds AI Employees for Hotels. Our first agent is a hotel phone receptionist that lets hotels spend less time answering phone calls and more time helping customers. Our system handles front-desk inquiries, in-room dining orders, and reservations. It answers every question instantly and in any language, 24/7.

We are solving a problem that older phone systems and IVRs can't: customers hate not being able to talk to someone immediately, but most travel businesses can’t dedicate additional staff to manage phone lines. Voice AI has always seemed out of reach because the technology infrastructure in the travel industry is often fragmented, with reservation systems, loyalty programs, and in-house operations software that weren’t designed with voice AI in mind. Riviera addresses this by integrating seamlessly with existing software providers and using human-sounding voice models that are highly trained on data specific to each business type and department.

Hotels spend hundreds of billions annually on staffing and risk losing potential revenue when phone lines are overwhelmed or callers hang up. By enabling them to handle unlimited calls, day or night, Riviera unlocks additional revenue and eases labor challenges.
one_liner: AI Employees for Hotels

name: Calltree AI
long_description: Calltree makes enterprise-grade AI support reps for call centers. Our AI reps take voice calls and chats like other AI support agents but can also use internal enterprise tools like a homegrown CRM or internal dashboards, like the highly trained humans working there today.
one_liner: Enterprise-grade AI support reps for call centers

name: Outlit
long_description:
Outlit is building AI to automate quoting and proposal generation.

We help revenue teams increase margins and deal velocity by automating tasks like creating, pricing, and reviewing—ensuring every deal is executed faster with better margin.

We’ve created the largest Deal Desk community on Slack, with decision-makers from companies like Stripe, Uber, LinkedIn, Rev.com, and more.
one_liner: AI Quoting and Proposals

name: Sennu AI
long_description: Sennu's AI agents automate Salesforce functional testing. Just connect your user stories and we'll take care of the rest.
one_liner: Hands off Salesforce QA

name: Infinite
long_description: Infinite is a stablecoin payment processor. We offer businesses turnkey APIs and SDKs to instantly move money anywhere in the world at a fraction of the cost of traditional solutions.
one_liner: Global B2B Stablecoin Processor

name: TripleZip
long_description: TripleZip is a platform that automates accounting for commercial real estate using AI. CRE firms use TripleZip to save up to 95% on accounting compared to hiring an outside firm for complex tasks like CAM reconciliation and budgeting.
one_liner: Automating CRE accounting with AI

name: Artificial Societies
long_description:
Artificial Societies uses AI to simulate large groups of people and how they interact. Companies like Anthropic and 11x are using Artificial Societies to predict how their marketing and content will perform in a simulation of their target customers, before launching in the real world. 

This is a cracked team: James left rural China at age 14, got into Cambridge, turned down a CS PhD to do startups, and - in his spare time - lead the largest ever study of an LLM society. James is joined by Patrick, an applied behavioural scientist who has run over 200 real-world experiments for businesses including Fortune 500 companies. 

We joined forces through a shared frustration that no one really understands large scale human behaviours: traditional market research is not only slow and expensive, but fundamentally flawed - it misses how people influence each other. Humans are not isolated individuals, we are social animals.

We began by simulating a network of 1,000 investors, and used it to raise a pre-seed and get into YC. Since releasing this publicly as “Wave”, startup founders have run over 3000 simulations. 

We have since released "Reach", where anyone can simulate their own LinkedIn audience and test how their posts will perform before posting for real. Artificial Societies is doing for simulations what ChatGPT did for LLMs - making them accessible to everyone.

As AI advances, we will create representative models of entire human societies. Our vision is a world where all content, products, and policies are first simulated in an Artificial Society. We are on a mission to create Artificial Collective Intelligence - humans innovate in collectives, we want to scale collective innovation with ACI.
one_liner: We use AI to simulate entire human societies

name: AfterQuery
long_description: AfterQuery is a research lab (backed by Y Combinator) investigating the boundaries and capabilities of artificial intelligence through novel datasets and experimentation. We believe that pushing the frontiers of AI requires both rigorous scientific inquiry and exceptional human data.
one_liner: Research lab investigating the boundaries of AI capabilities.

name: Demeter
long_description: Demeter is the AI platform to maximize private investment returns. It enriches portfolio data with deep research to automate performance tracking and benchmarking for value creation.
one_liner: AI Value Creation Team for Private Equity

name: Spott
long_description:
Spott is the first AI-native ATS/CRM for recruiting & staffing firms. We built Spott because existing recruitment platforms require extensive manual work, are clunky to use, rely on fragmented add-ons, and are not designed for AI adoption.

Spott combines everything recruiting firms need, from a full ATS & CRM to AI agents across the entire workflow, into one AI-native solution. It enables recruiters to focus on what matters most and close more placements.
one_liner: AI-native ATS/CRM for recruiting firms

name: Bluebook
long_description:
Bluebook is building AI agents for accounting firms to accelerate research, reconciliations and monthly closings. We allow professionals to serve 200 clients instead of just 20. With research time cut by 30% accountants can provide more strategic advice to help their clients thrive. The 30 leading firms in the Nordics already use Bluebook.

The accounting industry faces a perfect storm: a massive CPA retirement wave (75% in the coming 15 years), increasing complexity from globalization and new regulations, and private equity consolidation driving productivity demands. LLMs enables software that can understand context, adapt to new scenarios, and handle complex accounting tasks with human-like reasoning - capabilities that traditional rule-based software lacks.
one_liner: AI for accounting

name: CopyCat
long_description: CopyCat is the next-gen RPA using browser agents. With our self-serve builder, users can automate complex web workflows by combining intelligent browser agent prompts with deterministic actions. These automations can be deployed in the cloud, triggered via API, or scheduled to run automatically.
one_liner: The AI RPA - Powered by Browser Agents

name: Ergo
long_description: Ergo is AI for sales teams, monitoring customer communication across tools like Zoom, Email, and Slack to keep CRMs such as HubSpot and Salesforce up to date. Ergo’s AI agents execute revenue-generating activities, such as automating mid-funnel follow-ups based on external market signals and past customer interactions. By eliminating manual operational tasks, Ergo helps sales teams maintain active pipelines, prevent deals from stalling, and cut sales cycles in half.
one_liner: AI Agents for Sales Operations

name: Fluidize
long_description: Fluidize accelerates R&D for scientists and engineers by using AI to build and run simulations and experiments. Our platform speeds up development pipelines by automating setup, execution, validation, and scaling, allowing engineers to focus on their science.
one_liner: Helping scientists and engineers run experiments with AI.

name: Vantel
long_description:
Vantel builds AI software for commercial insurance brokers.

Our first product doubles their productivity by automating policy analysis and contract review.
one_liner: AI Software for Commercial Insurance Brokers

name: Ambral
long_description:
Ambral is an AI account management team built to help B2B SaaS companies maximize revenue from every customer.

Ambral synthesizes signals from all customer activity and interactions into AI-powered models of every account. It pinpoints who needs attention and why, and autonomously drives or recommends expansions, prevents churn, and ensures no customer slips through the cracks. It's like mission control for your customers.

Team: 
Sam (CEO): 2x founder. Led AI Product at Everlywell and early PM at Wonder (now valued at $7bn). Lived the pain of losing customer intimacy at scale and is obsessed with solving it. Cornell CS alum.

Jack (CTO): Ex-SpaceX Flight Software Special Projects, where he developed telemetry routing and analysis systems for the most complex machines ever created. He’s now doing the same for the complexities of customer relationships. Cornell CS alum.

Why:
As B2B companies scale, the founder-level customer intimacy that drives early growth becomes impossible to maintain. Customer context that once fit in a founder's head scatters across systems, logs, and communication channels, drowning teams in noise no human can make sense of. Account managers juggling multiple customers become reactive firefighters, bleeding revenue through missed upsells and preventable churn. We've lived this pain and are building Ambral to help teams scale their most valuable asset: customer obsession.
one_liner: AI-powered Account Managers

name: Wayline
long_description: Wayline is an AI front desk assistant purpose-built for real estate to answer calls and messages 24/7. It’s like an always-on property manager that can convert leads and resolve issues better than any human, day or night. Our AI can be setup in as little as 24 hours and works seamlessly with existing phone/management software. Uniquely, our AI knowledge base is domain-specific to learn and handle the most complex real estate workflows. For property operators, Wayline instantly replaces robo-menus and call centers, while centralizing and scaling back-office teams.
one_liner: AI voice for property managers

name: Frekil
long_description:
AI is transforming healthcare, but the biggest bottleneck remains—procuring and annotating medical images with speed, accuracy, and scale. Frekil eliminates this roadblock.

Frekil helps healthcare AI teams, medical device companies, and pharmaceutical companies procure and annotate medical images like X-rays, CTs, MRIs, etc., efficiently for AI training, clinical trials, and FDA approvals. Our AI-assisted platform speeds up annotation 10x while maintaining high accuracy through real-time quality control, consensus checks, and advanced 3D visualization.

We also provide tools to track annotator performance, build custom workflows, and increase labeling accuracy. By combining efficiency with precision, Frekil enables teams to build high-quality datasets much faster, supporting the development and deployment of reliable medical AI and clinical research solutions.
one_liner: Scale AI for Medical Scans

name: Capacitive
long_description:
Enterprise AI without your internal data is like a computer without internet. When vital information is scattered across Slack, Notion, and Salesforce, AI tools can't deliver. And connecting dozens of those tools directly to your systems introduces significant security vulnerabilities and maintenance challenges.

Capacitive offers a better way: connect us once to where your data lives, then create secure data gateways with granular cross-platform permissions, comprehensive monitoring, and robust security filtering. Supercharge tools like Cursor with product and team-level context — or use those access points via our built-in AI chat system, where your team can navigate your organization's knowledge and perform actions across platforms in one place.
one_liner: The AI Agent Platform for Knowledge Workers.

name: stratify
long_description:
Stratify is the AI-powered user researcher that discovers the why behind every decision, click, and preference.
Our platform uses agentic workflows that instantly recruit participants, conduct user interviews, analyze responses, and provide actionable insights.
one_liner: AI agents that help you understand your customers' needs

name: Operative
long_description: Operative uses AI to help organizations generate & modify internal frontend applications that connect to their existing backend APIs. You can think of it like Retool, except instead of external integrations, we connect into an organization’s internal backends, and we use AI to generate the frontend code for the web applications users want to create.
one_liner: AI Infrastructure for autonomous software creation and interaction

name: Tinfoil
long_description:
Tinfoil makes it easy to make your AI workloads provably private, without changing your code. You get the privacy of on-prem deployments, while running on the cloud.

We’ve built a full-stack platform on top of the latest NVIDIA GPUs offering confidential computing capabilities, meaning that you don’t have to tradeoff performance for privacy. 

Under the hood, we integrate a suite of recent advances in secure hardware technologies, in particular NVIDIA’s confidential compute mode available on Hopper and Blackwell. When combined with Tinfoil’s software stack, companies can prove their security claims rather than relying on unenforceable statements like "trust us, we don’t log your queries.” Tinfoil guarantees that all data always stays private and cannot be accessed by anyone other than the end user — not even by Tinfoil or the cloud provider it’s processed on. 

The founding team combines deep academic and industry experience in security and internet protocols. Tanya was previously a systems engineer at Cloudflare, where she built Internet security protocols used by billions, and contributed to the Workers AI platform. Jules and Sacha recently completed their PhDs at MIT where they worked on secure hardware and privacy-preserving technologies. Jules has also worked at NVIDIA on their confidential computing team. Nate has deep infrastructure experience, starting in high school when he built a mini-CDN that got him an internship at Cloudflare. Tinfoil was born from our personal frustration with the false choice between access to powerful AI and data privacy.

As AI becomes tightly integrated into our lives and business workflows, it will touch an ever increasing amount of sensitive personal and proprietary data. Right now, the only solutions are DPAs, band-aids like PII redaction, or the nuclear option of running everything on-prem. These solutions are not scalable.  By making it easy to deploy provable privacy, Tinfoil promises to unlock significantly deeper AI adoption and integrations, just as TLS on the Internet enabled e-commerce to flourish by securing credit cards on the network.

If OpenAI is creating “God in a box”, we are putting God in a blackbox, so Satan can’t spy.
one_liner: Tinfoil makes your AI workflows secure, verifiable, and private.

name: Clado
long_description: Clado puts 800 million+ people profiles (and growing) at your fingertips with simple, agentic search. If you’re interested in a global people search for sales, spreadsheets, hiring, and more, try our product at clado.ai
one_liner: Deep Research for People

name: Odapt
long_description:
Odapt lets anyone build AI-powered internal software using plain language. We connect all your apps and internal data into one place - giving our AI agents the cross-system awareness most tools lack. Operators, marketers, and finance leads can now prompt Odapt to design and ship context-specific tools in minutes, without any engineering bottlenecks.

We believe software should be built by the people who use it. Teams already use Odapt to unify sales data, automate documentation, and run recruiting ops—all without writing a line of code. With AI, we’re unlocking 10x more builders inside companies - and giving them the tools to create what they need, when they need it.

Our team has deep roots in AI, ops, and product:
Lucas worked on code-gen at OpenAI and bootstrapped to $1M ARR.
Ende deployed AI safety across 20M+ devices and was part of Stanford’s NLP lab.
Madhav was an operator at McKinsey and founding BizOps lead at a recruiting startup.
one_liner: How great teams build internal software & agent workflows

name: Opusense AI
long_description:
Opusense AI automates field report writing for construction field inspectors. Instead of typing up notes at the end of the day, inspectors can now walk a site, speak observations aloud, snap photos, and let our AI assistant generate a detailed, organized report on-site and in real time.

Combined, the founding team has over 15 years in the construction industry. Writing up these field reports used to take up at least 20% of the week. With Opusense, we cut that time by 5x. Our team combines deep construction experience with technical expertise, Roya has a PhD in civil engineering, and Michael has worked at multiple construction tech startups.

Why hasn’t this been done before? Construction is slow to adopt new tech, and reporting is messy, photos, voice notes, and field notes all live in silos. Turning that into a clear, structured report requires real insight into how inspectors work and what clients need. Only now, with advances in AI, can we process unstructured data adequately to generate high-quality reports in real time.

The opportunity is massive. Every inspection firm and contractor is struggling with documentation. Manual reports slow them down, create inconsistencies, and delay handoffs. We believe AI can do this better, and Opusense is proving it.
one_liner: AI for Field Inspection Reports

name: Clidey
long_description:
Clidey is building Docucod (https://docucod.com)

Docucod auto-generates and maintains always-up-to-date documentation—right from your codebase. Your team can move faster, onboard quicker, and stay focused on building.

Seamless to set up and built for scale, it fits cleanly into any repo—whether you're shipping solo or leading a growing dev team. Docucod tracks your PRs and understands what changes need to be made to the documentation and then makes them.

From onboarding guides to API references and system diagrams, Docucod creates clear, accurate documentation—without slowing you down.

It’s developer-first, fully editable, and always in sync—so you never have to choose between speed and quality again.
one_liner: Documentation made for AI Agents

name: HABIT
long_description: HABIT will deploy on-demand robotic labor to you — and to restaurants, hotels, stores, and farms in your neighborhood. Our first vertical (the $45B car wash and auto detailing market) is high cost, labor intensive, and already offered in thousands of locations across America.
one_liner: Reshaping neighborhood services with robotics.

name: throxy
long_description:
throxy is building vertical AI agents that book meetings for companies selling into traditional industries like manufacturing, logistics, education, and finance.

Outbound is broken—generic automation gets ignored, and legacy sectors are hard to crack. throxy fixes this by running bespoke, fully-managed outbound systems for sales teams. We combine AI Agents with human experts to deliver hyper-personalised campaigns that consistently generate six-figure qualified pipelines.

Since 2023, throxy has powered outbound for B2B companies, from industrial manufacturers to fintech providers, replacing the need for internal SDR teams or heaps of tools, with a solution that outperforms in both speed and quality.

Our founding team has built AI at JP Morgan, scaled businesses from age 14, and led enterprise sales from Seed to Series D. We’re not just automating outbound, we’re redefining what sales execution looks like in traditional industries.

throxy is the AI SDR purpose-built for the sectors software forgot.
one_liner: Vertical AI agents that run the sales funnel on autopilot

name: Cleon
long_description:
Cleon is building an AI-native software implementation platform to speed up customer onboarding, beginning with a focus on ingesting complex Excel files with agentic AI. 

B2B SaaS companies have millions of dollars of contracted revenue sitting behind implementations. Cleon handles everything from the big picture (generating requirements and aligning stakeholders) to the details (data cleaning and schema mapping). 

The team consists of Alexandros (ex-athlete in rowing and engineer at a proptech startup), Rohan (engineer at a fintech startup with long implementations and at an SAP code migration startup), and Ric (banker at RBC and enterprise sales at Palantir).
one_liner: AI Agents for Software Implementations

name: Lyra
long_description:
At Lyra, we believe B2B sales hasn’t meaningfully evolved in decades — until now. The next industrial revolution is here, and we’re building the platform to power it.

Modern buyers want less talk, faster decisions, and seamless experiences. Lyra helps sales teams close more deals, shorten sales cycles, and operate more efficiently — all with minimal rep involvement.

We built our own meeting software from the ground up with a real-time AI agent at its core:
- Surfaces and personalizes relevant sales collateral using live conversation intelligence
- Keeps deals moving by answering buyer questions when reps are offline
- Replaces decks, screen shares, and long email threads with a single interactive workspace — called a Lyra. It hosts your meetings, onboarding, and integrates tools like DocuSign to give buyers a seamless path from first call to signed contract

Hundreds of sales calls are already hosted on Lyra, including several YC companies. We hit $100K ARR in our first two weeks.

We’re rethinking the sales stack from first call to signed contract.
one_liner: AI-Native Zoom For Revenue Teams

name: Theta Software
one_liner: Self-Learning for AI Agents

name: Nixo
long_description: Most orgs think custom implementations are slow because each one is too unique. In reality, FDEs lose days chasing customers for details and redoing overlapping work. With Nixo, you can scope customer problems faster, discover opportunities to reuse code, and get instant visibility into workload across accounts.
one_liner: The first ops platform built for FDEs

name: QualGent
long_description:
QualGent is an AI Mobile App Quality Assurance Tester that mimics a real human, helping teams catch bugs and ship faster - without hiring more QA testers. One customer reached #3 in the Education category on the App Store by improving app quality with QualGent.

Mobile bugs hurt: crashes kill ratings, broken checkouts drive churn. QualGent helps teams scale QA effortlessly and avoid Sonos-level disasters.

The idea for QualGent was born from the founders’ experience leading engineering teams at Google across Android XR, Stadia, Quick Share, and foldable devices where shipping to billions of users meant constantly facing the painful trade-off between moving fast and maintaining quality. With prior research experience at Nvidia, Maryland, and Berkeley, the team saw a clear opportunity: use AI to scale QA.

QualGent’s vision is to close the loop on software creation. As AI enables engineers to code 100x faster, QualGent eliminates the next bottleneck—software verification—unlocking truly scalable, end-to-end software development.
one_liner: AI Mobile App Quality Assurance Tester

name: Alkali
long_description: Alkali is building the co-pilot for chemical process design. Spot design errors earlier, get the right equipment sooner, and build chemical projects faster.
one_liner: Your Copilot for Building Chemical Projects

name: Eloquent AI
long_description:
We automate complex, regulated operations in financial services—no APIs, no engineering required.
We hit $500K ARR in just four weeks because customers deploy instantly.
Our AI Operator learns by observing existing workflows and SOPs, securely controlling browser and desktop applications to automate up to 96% of tasks.
one_liner: The AI Operator for Financial Services

name: Scalar Field
long_description:
We’re building an AI-powered Bloomberg Terminal using Financial Agents.

I used to be a trader at Tower Research and Goldman Sachs, and I’m building Scalar Field with my co-founder Ramakant, who led engineering teams at Microsoft.

We’ve both spent our careers at the intersection of finance and technology — and we’re using that experience to reimagine how markets are analyzed and traded.

Scalar Field is built around a simple idea: most people log into a terminal because, consciously or subconsciously, they’re trying to validate a hypothesis.

But today’s terminals don’t help with that. They’re dashboards — not thinking tools.

So we built Scalar Field to change that: a platform where users can test any market hypothesis instantly using intelligent agents.

You can spin up agents that react to market events, run backtests across data from multiple asset classes, and even trigger trades when specific conditions are met — all in one place.
one_liner: Reinventing the trading terminal — one intelligent agent at a time.

name: Synthetic Society
one_liner: Synthetic Agents to Simulate Real Users

name: Probo
long_description:
Probo acts like your compliance team. You tell us how you work, and Probo does the rest:
1. Set the right requirements - not overkill
2. Handle docs, risks, controls, evidence
3. Run the audit
4. Keep everything up to date afterward
Founders shouldn’t lose weeks to this stuff. Even one day is too much.
one_liner: We help you get compliant while you focus on your business.

name: WorkDone Health
long_description: WorkDone Health is an AI compliance copilot for hospitals and clinics. We are like Grammarly for doctors, finding and fixing mistakes that lead to denied insurance claims or patient lawsuits. The industry today spends $40B doing this manually.
one_liner: Real-time AI Compliance for Medical Documentation

name: Delty
long_description:
As software systems grow more complex and teams scale, key engineering work happens outside of code: product specs, docs, and architecture decisions and norms. That’s where a staff software engineer shines.

Delty is an AI staff engineer.

Like a seasoned engineer embedded in your team, Delty understands your architecture, code evolution, and constraints. It designs new software systems and grounds your coding agents with real engineering context to help you deliver reliable, scalable systems, fast.
one_liner: AI staff engineer: software architect that leads coding agents

name: Lumari
long_description: Lumari enables GTM teams to automate their manual operational work using custom-built agents that deeply understand their company context.
one_liner: Agentic internal tools

name: Cactus
long_description: We're building an AI copilot for solopreneurs to automate their admin work. Our AI answers the phone, qualifies customers, and books in revenue. We see a future where solopreneurs will fully vibe code and run their entire business on Cactus.
one_liner: AI copilot for solopreneurs

name: StarSling
long_description: StarSling is building an agentic developer homepage that automates all the tasks that eat up a developer’s time after they’ve left their code editor: deployments, performance, incidents, and bugs. Open your homepage, click on a GitHub, Linear, or Sentry issue and you’ll see an Autofix button that triggers an AI agent and opens up a Pull Request with a fix, all without leaving your homepage.
one_liner: Cursor for DevOps

name: Theorem
long_description: Theorem is training models that make program verification 10,000 times faster. Using verification as a feedback loop, developers have found zero-days in GPU accelerated code and cryptography implementations, and sped up code migration in legacy systems. If you have complicated code that needs to be correct and secure, sign up for our beta!
one_liner: Program verification so even your systems engineers can vibecode

name: Airweave
long_description: Airweave is an open-source tool that lets agents search any app. It connects to productivity tools, databases, or document stores and transforms their contents into searchable knowledge bases for agents.
one_liner: Open-Source Tool That Lets Agents Search Any App

name: Bond
long_description: Our AI Chief of Staff gives CEOs and busy executives instant visibility into project progress, team performance and key company metrics. Eliminating status updates and saving execs 10+ hours a week.
one_liner: Building Donna, your AI Chief of Staff

name: Docket
long_description: Docket lets you write end-to-end tests in plain English and keeps them up to date automatically—powered by real user sessions.
one_liner: AI agents for web testing

name: Cohesive
long_description: Cohesive is the agentic CRM for blue collar businesses like janitorial, pressure washing, landscaping, HVAC, and pest control businesses. Cohesive fully automates sales and marketing outreach to local businesses and property owners in the service area, helping local service businesses grow even while servicing clients in the field.
one_liner: The agentic CRM for blue-collar services

name: GETASAP ASIA
long_description: We use a network of optimized fulfillment centers to offer the lowest prices and 8 hour same-day delivery to corner stores, restaurants, and supermarket chains in Southeast Asia.
one_liner: Tech-Enabled Distribution for Retailers in Southeast Asia

name: Closera
long_description:
We are building Harvey for Commercial Real Estate. 


Closera automates the most time-consuming tasks that slows deals down:
• Sales decks that used to take 4 weeks and cost $5,000? Now done in minutes
• Property valuation models that took hours? Built in seconds
• Verifying data for thousands of listings? Happens all at once, not over days

Closera is building the AI native operating system for the $37T commercial real estate industry. 

Learn more at closera.com
one_liner: AI employees for commercial real estate

name: The Prompting Company
long_description:
The problem:
People are no longer searching on Google. They’re ASKING AI. If your product doesn’t appear in AI answers, you’re dead.

How it works:
1. Find & analyze user questions: We find the exact questions your users ask and check how often your product is mentioned.
2. Create content: We tell you what to post, where to post, and do it for you.
3. Route to AI-optimized page:We redirect AI traffic to AI-optimized page

Offer: Get your free AI visibility report → promptingcompany.com
one_liner: We help products get mentioned in ChatGPT.

name: truthsystems
long_description:
Truth Systems provides a compliance agent to govern the use of generative AI. It translates a firm's operational policies into intelligent, real-time guardrails that monitor every AI interaction. This empowers companies to proactively block non-compliant actions and align access to AI tools with user competency. By eliminating the risks and operational blind spots associated with uncontrolled AI adoption, our platform enables enterprises to fully leverage the technology's potential without compromising security. 

We are establishing the new standard for AI governance, building a future where every professional can innovate safely and confidently.
one_liner: Building the unified governance layer for regulated industries

name: Lanesurf
long_description:
Lanesurf helps freight brokers book shipments with vetted carriers at the best prices by negotiating rates across multiple calls in parallel.

Our self-improving voice AI stack is built for the messy reality of logistics - noisy calls, compliance checks, constant exceptions and turns them into faster bookings at better margins.

With each booking, the AI learns from aggregated, anonymized lane and pricing data. As more customers use Lanesurf, this learning compounds, driving faster bookings at the best prices and powering a voice-driven freight marketplace.
one_liner: Voice AI for booking freight

name: Async
long_description:
Async is a platform to manage a team of coding agents from anywhere.
It lets you issue tasks, then handles coding and testing in the background. Review results on mobile or desktop, preview changes in-app, run tasks in parallel, and move faster than ever before.

Our mission is to do the work that you don't want to: bug fixes, UI tweaks, papercuts, and KTLO.
Do what's important - delegate the rest to Async.
one_liner: A team of coding agents in your pocket

name: Golpo
long_description: The world's best AI video generator that turns your documents and/or prompts into whiteboard explainer videos. In addition, we have a similar product that generates podcast-style audio explainers from your documents/prompts. API access available for both video and conversational audio. Product of Red Tree Inc. Please reach out at founders@golpoai.com
one_liner: Most Powerful AI Video Gen Model for Explainer Videos From Documents

name: Shor
long_description:
Shor is a new Employer-of-Record built from the ground up with AI agents and stablecoins. We enable remote teams to hire and pay global employees at a fraction of the cost. The process is fast, simple, and fully compliant.

Today, global payroll is broken. Payments take days, cost 5–10% in fees, and force companies to navigate complex banking, tax, and labor regulations. Platforms like Deel and Rippling solved this for large enterprises but remain too expensive and cumbersome for the millions of startups and growing remote teams scaling globally.

Shor fixes this by combining autonomous AI agents with stablecoin-based settlement. Our agents handle contracts, worker classification, compliance, and payroll automatically in a simple, messaging-first experience. Payments can settle in seconds rather than weeks at a fraction of the cost of legacy providers.

We are making global payroll fast, affordable, and accessible for the millions of companies left out by legacy platforms.
one_liner: The fastest, most affordable payroll for global teams

name: Liva AI
long_description: GenAI models trained on internet data still lack realistic, domain-specific results, and we solve this by delivering high-quality offline data through targeted recruitment and a consumer upload platform.
one_liner: Scale AI for video and voice data.

name: Sentinel
long_description: Sentinel is your 24/7 on-call engineer which investigates, diagnoses and suggests resolutions for production issues. Sentinel helps teams reduce alert fatigue and downtime, saving engineers from firefighting so they can focus on building.
one_liner: AI on-call engineer

name: Lark
long_description:
Lark is building AI agents to solve billing issues for subscription companies. Vijit and Jack previously built the usage-based billing product at Stripe. We are working with four customers including Midjourney & Character AI. 

Today, the customer billing experience for subscription companies is broken. Customers must contact support for simple issues like requesting refunds and downgrading plans. This leads to high billing support volume, low customer satisfaction, and churn. Lark builds AI agents that resolve these issues instantly, with deep billing integrations that factor in usage data, account for prorations and credits, and have strong guardrails to ensure safe actions.

Over time, we will evolve this into a customer-first billing platform with AI automation built in from day one.
one_liner: AI Agents for Billing Operations

name: Monarcha
long_description:
Monarcha is an AI-powered geospatial platform built for logistics, real estate, urban planning, and environmental teams. It turns natural language into powerful spatial analysis, styling, and workflows with no GIS expertise required.

Working with geospatial data today is slow, fragmented, and deeply technical. Simple tasks often require desktop based software and coding expertise. Most platforms rely on outdated desktop software, steep learning curves, and disconnected tools. Even simple tasks like uploading data, running a buffer, or visualizing zones can take hours and require specialists.

Monarcha changes that.
We connect directly to your data, enrich it with public datasets, understand spatial context, and let you run 50+ spatial tools instantly on the map. Upload vector or raster files, run PostGIS SQL queries, generate heatmaps, clip zones, and more all with a simple prompt. We're giving everyone the power of advanced spacial analysis to help save time, money and unlock siloed geospatial data across entire organizations. 

Want to learn more? Check out monarcha.ai
one_liner: The AI GIS Platform

name: Orange Slice
long_description:
Orange Slice uses AI agents to crawl the internet for signals/firmographic data that help sales teams find high-intent prospects by continuously monitoring the internet for buying signals and firmographic changes.

Our agents scan millions of data sources - including company websites, news articles, job postings, press releases, and social media - to detect meaningful events such as leadership changes, product launches, funding rounds, hiring trends, and more. These insights are transformed into actionable sales signals that indicate a company’s likelihood to purchase your product.

With Orange Slice, revenue teams can prioritize outreach, personalize messaging, and dramatically improve conversion rates by engaging the right accounts at the right time - based on what’s actually happening, not just static firmographics.
one_liner: AI agents that find you customers who already want to buy

name: Panels
long_description: Panels is an audio data platform that delivers large-scale, richly labeled speech datasets from vetted, diverse contributors to power training and evaluation of foundational voice models.
one_liner: Voice data that makes machines sound human

name: Qualify.bot
long_description: Qualify.bot helps commercial lenders and loan brokers process business loan applications with 4x higher conversion rates. Our AI voice calls eliminates 8+ hours of manual work per loan, from lead qualification to document collection & follow-ups.
one_liner: AI phone agents for Commercial Lending

name: Janet AI
long_description:
Janet AI is the intelligent ticket management system.

As organizations scale, Jira turns into chaos. Related issues are filed under different teams. De-duping is tedious. Critical insights get lost in comment threads. Tickets are never seen by anyone with full context. As a result, teams spend hundreds of manual hours just figuring out what’s important—before they can even start fixing it.

Janet AI watches every incoming ticket to build a knowledge graph and automatically surfaces related tickets, streamlines routing, flags prior fixes, and identifies what matters most—across all projects and teams.
one_liner: The AI-Native Jira

name: OnDeck AI
long_description:
We let organizations instantly find any object, behavior or event, in any footage, without needing to train a model or collect any training data.

The Pain: Creating vision models usually takes months: collecting training data, training, then deployment.  Worse yet: 
+ it’s often impossible to get enough data for a specific task, and 
+ even the best cv models struggle to generalize across diverse camera setups, workflows and environments. 

To overcome these blockers, we bet early on the power of VLMs and built a vision engine that can generalize across any task and doesn’t need any training data. We published a NeurIPS workshop paper showing our new methods with VLMs beat traditional CV even at niche tasks.

Our current customers include:
- National Defense Organizations
- Robotics Research
- Security cameras
- Behaviour analysis for port monitoring
- Off-shore oil & gas monitoring
one_liner: Analyze any footage, without training a model

name: Skope
long_description: We’re building the billing system for AI products. We support every standard type of pricing model (usage, subscription, hybrid, etc) and are the first to natively support outcome-based pricing. For the first time ever, AI companies can bill their customers exactly the way they want to be billed.
one_liner: The billing system for AI products

name: Frizzle
long_description:
Frizzle uses AI to grade handwritten math assignments for teachers, providing personalized feedback for every student. Teachers spend over 10 hours a week or 25% of all their work grading - Frizzle does it in minutes. Frizzle is the most valuable piece of software for teachers ever, as it eliminates the most time-consuming part of their workflow so they can focus on teaching.

Frizzle was named an official White House AI Education Partner alongside OpenAI and Meta: https://www.whitehouse.gov/edai/.

Frizzle was co-founded by Abhay Gupta and Shyam Sai, who met in high school over 10 years ago.
one_liner: AI grading for teachers, starting with math

name: Keystone
long_description: Keystone is an AI engineer that joins your team and understands your product from codebase to production. It can triage tickets, fix bugs, and automatically resolve incidents, autonomously.
one_liner: Your team's AI software engineer

name: Stockline
long_description:
Stockline is reshaping ERPs to bring innovation to a $990B+ industry left behind by the tech revolution: the food supply chain.

Food wholesalers still rely on software from the 90s. One symptom among many: they waste hours retyping orders and invoices that arrive through scattered channels like WhatsApp, SMS, and email into their ERPs. Manual admin work takes over. Headcount grows just to handle repetitive tasks.
This leads to mistakes, tight margins, and food waste.

Stockline replaces outdated ERPs with AI at its core. The game-changer? No more manual data entry. Our AI pulls orders from every channel and feeds them directly into one unified system.

Admin disappears. Wholesalers get to focus on what really matters: their products and their customers.
one_liner: AI-native ERP for food wholesalers

name: Tesora
long_description: Tesora builds AI procurement analysts for advanced industries. Our analyst first handles supplier discovery, qualification, and negotiations over voice and email, creating a net new function that was not possible before.
one_liner: AI procurement analysts for advanced industries

name: Lemma
long_description:
Lemma is the consumer insights platform that helps businesses answer the question: What do people think of our brand and products?

Our team of Stanford grads previously led the viewer satisfaction data insights platform at YouTube and performed AI research at Harvard Medical School and Stanford School of Medicine. We’re working with Disney and other consumer brands to capture customer sentiment on everything from your favorite TV character’s death to the action figurine at the Disneyland gift shop.

We are the only all-in-one consumer insights platform with specialized agents that can (1) scour the internet to discover and interpret ongoing conversations to see what people are actually saying, (2) automate survey writing and data collection, and (3) author a draft memo or report in minutes, cutting through days of manual work at a time.
one_liner: AI-powered consumer brands insights platform

name: Kalinda
long_description:
Kalinda helps class action law firms qualify potential cases in minutes with AI.

The nature of class action/mass torts involves thousands of cases for a single lawsuit. For every plaintiff (injured person), law firms involved in these cases compile everything from the products they used to the injuries they have. This data is extensive, granular, and buried deep in thousands of pages of medical, financial, and employment records and others.

Kalinda extracts, summarizes, and aggregates data from these records for attorneys with AI.

When scaled across an entire litigation, Kalinda works tirelessly and in parallel—turning a process that once took months into just a few hours. 

Kalinda provides firms with the equivalent manpower of hundreds of paralegals and legal nurses, allowing them to quickly determine which claimants are eligible and helping them file faster and in greater volume.

To date, we’ve processed 600k pages of records and are live with 2 of the largest plaintiff law firms in the U.S!
one_liner: Deep research for class action lawsuits

name: Parachute
long_description: Parachute helps hospitals adopt AI safely and at scale. We vet AI tools that fill clinical gaps, run state-of-the-art evaluations, monitor every model for drift and compliance, and lock every decision in an immutable audit trail.
one_liner: Evaluate, Deploy, and Monitor Clinical AI

name: Trace
long_description:
Trace is a workflow automation platform that pairs each task with the right human or AI agent. It connects to your internal tools to build a unified index of people, activity, and docs and learns how your teams work. 

Trace breaks workflows into clear steps, sends repetitive tasks to AI agents, and routes the rest to the right people while respecting permissions and logging every action. 

We help teams cut busywork and unify AI tools across departments – without disrupting operations.
one_liner: Workflow engine routing repetitive tasks to AI agents

name: GhostEye
long_description: GhostEye predicts insider threats before they happen. Our behavioral analysis platform integrates with existing security infrastructure to identify high-risk individuals and prevent data breaches.
one_liner: Real-time insider risk prediction

name: Comena
long_description: We build AI agents that automate order processing for industrial distributors and manufacturers. Say goodbye to inside sales teams spending hours on manual data entry. Comena streamlines order and quote entry, from inbox to ERP, freeing up sales teams to focus on high-value activities and proactive selling.
one_liner: AI agents for distributors and manufacturers to automate order entry.

name: VibeFlow
long_description: VibeFlow generates full-stack web apps from prompts with n8n-style visual workflows for the backend. Users of tools like Lovable or v0 can easily iterate over frontends because they can see them, while backends remain closed black boxes that are hard to evolve through prompting. VibeFlow opens up backend logic, making it visual and editable, with powerful integrations built in.
one_liner: Prompt to full stack app with visual workflows

name: Hyprnote
long_description: Hyprnote is an open-source AI notetaker for enterprises. It runs fully on-device or on-prem, ensuring that no data ever leaves your system. Hyprnote transcribes and summarizes conversations automatically, turning discussions into actionable knowledge without risking security or regulatory breaches. Unlike cloud-based tools like Granola or Otter, Hyprnote is built for industries where data control is non-negotiable - tech firms, finance, healthcare, government, and beyond.
one_liner: Open-source AI notetaker for enterprises

name: Relling
one_liner: Next Gen Data

name: Motives
long_description: Motives is a team of AI agents that runs qualitative research projects for consumer brands: moderating and analyzing video interviews to help brands understand consumer preferences and test new ideas, in hours instead of weeks.
one_liner: Consumer focus groups run by AI

name: Finto
long_description: Finto builds AI accounting software for enterprise finance teams. We automate the invoice-to-pay process from their email inbox to their ERP. Cutting out 80% of the accountants daily work in invoice recording, account coding and  invoice approvals.
one_liner: AI accounting for enterprise finance teams

name: Knowlify
long_description:
Everyone loves the way 3Blue1Brown explains complex ideas. Now imagine having that same level of clarity for any topic, tailored to each learner’s needs.

That’s what we’re building at Knowlify.

Current use cases:
- Researchers turn dense papers into clear, digestible explanations
- Textbook publishers help students grasp challenging concepts
- Universities produce high-quality content while cutting costs by 90%
- Corporations keep teams sharp and up to date on the latest technologies

With Knowlify, the possibilities for learning are limitless.
one_liner: Convert textual content into explainer videos in < 15s

name: Risely AI
long_description:
Risely’s AI agents will form the new operating system for universities, improving retention, staff productivity, and efficiency. Our platform integrates directly into existing university systems (SIS, LMS, CRM), learns each institution’s unique workflows, and deploys specialized AI agents. This dramatically reduces the $735 billion universities spend annually on administrative labor, expands staff capacity without increasing headcount, and improves the student experience.

This hasn't been done before because university workflows require nuanced, autonomous judgment, exactly what agentic AI was designed to solve. Our team uniquely combines deep expertise in higher education, enterprise-scale AI, and regulated enterprise sales.

Sadia previously built Salesforce’s Education Cloud from scratch, creating the core Student Information System widely used across higher education. She deeply understands university operations and maintains trusted relationships with hundreds of higher-ed CIOs and Provosts.

Danial was one of DoorDash’s earliest engineers, where he architected and scaled complex systems from zero to billions of transactions, including their search, recommendation, and Voice AI platforms. He knows how to build robust AI solutions that reliably perform at enterprise scale. 

Shahryar was a GM at Airwallex, where he built the entire Americas business from 0 to 1 and drove 11x revenue growth.  He’s also a master closer, single-handedly securing over $17M in enterprise deals at NerdWallet.  He’s a relentless startup executor with deep expertise launching and scaling go-to-market machines in highly regulated industries.

We launched six weeks ago and are already at $8k MRR, growing 55% week-over-week -- one of the fastest ramps ever in higher ed. Universities urgently need solutions that expand labor capacity and efficiency, especially as they face unprecedented budget pressure and staffing shortages.

With unmatched buyer access, deep technical expertise, and rapid early traction, we are perfectly positioned to own this enormous market.
one_liner: AI agents that automate administrative work across college campuses.

name: Minimal AI
long_description:
Minimal AI makes it easy for e-commerce brands to build and manage AI support teams that resolve 80% of tickets.

The result: reduced support costs while actually improving customer experience and sales. It feels like outsourcing your support to a team of AI Agents with human-like empathy.

Over 45 e-commerce brands use Minimal AI to handle thousands of customer support tickets daily.
one_liner: AI Customer Support Teams for E-commerce

name: Socratix AI
long_description:
Socratix builds AI coworkers for fraud and risk teams so that humans don't have to spend their days drowning in alerts and spreadsheets.

Today, fraud and risk teams at fintechs and banks are overwhelmed. Analysts jump between tools, manually stitch together context, and make judgment calls under pressure, often for hundreds of alerts a week. Too much of their work is slow, repetitive, and error-prone. We're here to change that. 

Socratix gives fraud and risk teams AI coworkers that investigate alerts in real time, replacing manual reviews with fast, explainable decisions. Socratix agents plug into existing workflows and reason across signals just like human analysts to help teams reduce fraud losses, minimize false positives, and scale operations without scaling headcount.

We've seen this problem firsthand. At DoorDash, Riya helped save $30M+ a year by building smarter fraud detection and investigation tooling, and at Unit21, she built products for analysts that made them 3X faster. We're able to build and sell enterprise-grade software. At Cruise, Satya built scalable AI systems powering petabyte-scale data, and at LinkedIn, he built enterprise products from 0 to 1 generating $50M+ in incremental revenue. Now, the two of us are teaming up to eliminate the manual toil in fraud and risk.

We're obsessed with fraud, LLMs, real-world automation, and the messy edge cases traditional ML has trouble handling. We believe that every fraud analyst should have an AI coworker - and the future of fraud will involve combining human-level reasoning with machine-speed execution.
one_liner: AI coworkers for fraud and risk teams.

name: Palace
long_description: Palace (palace.so) is an AI board observer that private market investors use to monitor+report on portfolio companies. We save investment teams 100's of hours every quarter on manual data entry and provide real-time analytics across their portfolio.
one_liner: Investment monitoring & reporting for private market investors

name: Sira
long_description:
Sira is the AI-powered platform for managing time tracking, scheduling, payroll, and HR — purpose-built for hourly teams.

Our intelligent agents handle the manual, time-consuming tasks for you — like calling workers to fill open shifts, detecting timesheet anomalies, and streamlining payroll processing.

With Sira, businesses stay organized, compliant, and focused on what really matters — while we take care of the team.
one_liner: AI HR manager for hourly teams

name: Locata
long_description:
Locata is an AI referral management platform for Health Centers. We deploy AI agents to automate every step of the referral process that back-office staff face daily, from submitting authorizations to broadcasting updates and following up with patients. This frees up staff to focus on patient care.

Primary Care back-offices are severely understaffed and overburdened by administrative work associated with referrals. Additionally, patients suffer navigating the complex referral process, which can have disastrous health effects if they don’t get the care they need. These factors point to a glaring gap in the system—where out of over 100 million specialist referrals issued annually in the US, only half are actually completed. Locata is tackling this problem head-on, saving administrative staff hours each week and ensuring that the referral process goes as smoothly as possible for patients and their providers.

Alejandro and Josh met at Stanford where they graduated with BS degrees in CS. Alejandro was a senior software engineer at Meta’s Reality Labs where he led development of several AI features for wearable products and prior to that conducted AI research at Stanford Medicine. Josh graduated with a masters in CS, specializing in AI, before working as a software engineer at Google, developing AI products that served over 1 billion users.

Within two weeks of building our product, we signed a major regional health center and are implementing our system to automate their entire referral workflow.
one_liner: AI referral management for Health Centers

name: Pally
long_description:
Hey 👋, we’re Haz and Wyatt, the founders of Pally, and we’re building at the intersection of AI and Human Relationships. 

We believe that while AI will automate a lot of low-level tasks, that this will dramatically increase the value of human connection at the highest level.
